scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npx vite --config vite.config.mjs serve --mode development --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.build: npm run build:vite && npm run copyEmailStyles
scripts.copyEmailStyles: mkdir -p ./web/css ./Magento_Sales/web/css/source ./Magento_Rma/web/css/source ./Magento_Bundle/web/css/source && cp -r -n ../../vendor/magento/theme-frontend-blank/web/css/email*.less ./web/css&& cp -r -n ../../vendor/magento/theme-frontend-blank/web/css/source ./web/css&& cp -r -n ../../vendor/magento/theme-frontend-blank/Magento_Sales/web/css/source/_email.less ./Magento_Sales/web/css/source&& cp -r -n ../../vendor/magento/theme-frontend-blank/Magento_Rma/web/css/source/_email.less ./Magento_Rma/web/css/source&& cp -r -n ../../vendor/magento/theme-frontend-blank/Magento_Bundle/web/css/source/_email.less ./Magento_Bundle/web/css/source
